data.name: BATTLE XXL
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to BATTLE XXL, a classical party battle game featured by freaky vehicles. Collect power-ups and destroy as many balloons and players as possible before getting destroyed. Various game modes like Battle, Mega Ramp, Survival, Race, Avalanche, Crash, Hill Bomb and Free Roam will bring endless fun. Can you defeat all opponents?




Battle with up to 32 players smashing through exciting arenas.

  • Each player has 3 balloons.
  • If you get hit you lose a balloon.
  • If you lose all 3 of your balloons you are out.
  • The last man standing wins the battle!




Battle with your friends in 4-player split-screen mode.
